```{r}
library(dbplyr)
library(mdsr)
library(RMySQL)
library(readr)
library(ggthemes)
db <- dbConnect_scidb("citibike")
```

```{sql connection=db}
SELECT * FROM trips
WHERE start_time LIKE '2017-03-29%'
LIMIT 0,10
```

```{r}
querynew <- "SELECT * FROM trips
WHERE start_time LIKE '2017-03-29%'
LIMIT 0,100"

querynew <- db %>% dbGetQuery(querynew) %>% collect()
timestuff <- as.data.frame(querynew)
timestuff
```

```{r}
format(timestuff$start_time, "%H")
```
